description: High tsunami warning issued for coastal areas. Expected wave height: 3-5 meters. Immediate evacuation required.
Cyclone Vardah approaching with wind speeds of 120-140 km/h. Heavy rainfall expected. Take necessary precautions.
Severe flooding reported in low-lying areas. Water level rising at 10cm/hour. Move to higher ground immediately.
Major oil spill detected 5km offshore. Approximately 1000 gallons leaked. Cleanup operations underway.
Storm surge warning for coastal regions. Expected surge height: 2-3 meters above normal tide levels.
